verses.name: Daniel 2:10
verses.text: The Chaldeans answered before the king, and said, There is not a man upon the earth that can shew the king’s matter: therefore there is no king, lord, nor ruler, that asked such things at any magician, or astrologer, or Chaldean.

verses.name: Daniel 2:11
verses.text: And it is a rare thing that the king requireth, and there is none other that can shew it before the king, except the gods, whose dwelling is not with flesh.

verses.name: Daniel 2:12
verses.text: For this cause the king was angry and very furious, and commanded to destroy all the wise men of Babylon.
